docs.summary: JSON representation of Wix site events for exposure to external site monitoring tools.
description: Corvid's site monitoring feature lets you connect Wix site events to an
external site monitoring tool. Each site event is recorded as a single log
entry, as defined in the JSON object below.
To learn more about adapting log entry JSON objects for your site monitoring tool,
see Connecting Site Events to a Monitoring Tool.
+ Log entry: Single record of a Wix site event.
+ Log: Collection of log entries associated with the same site and namespace.

docs.summary: Payload of the log entry in JSON format.
An object containing additional information about the log entry.

members.name: siteName
members.doc: Name of site with which the log entry is associated.

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Name of Wix application with which the log entry is associated, such as Stores or Bookings. The generic namespace 'Corvid' represents site code not associated with a specific Wix application.

members.name: tenantId
members.doc: Unique identifier for the site. Does not change even if the site name or other site attributes change.

members.name: viewMode
members.doc:
Indicates the viewing mode from which the log entry originates.
 One of the following:

 + `"preview"`: Preview mode.
 + `"site"`: Published site mode.

members.name: revision
members.doc: Unique identifier for a specific site [`revision`](wix-site.html#revision).

docs.summary: A JSON object representing a log entry.

examples.title: Log entry for console log in page code

members.name: logName
members.doc: Name of log to which the log entry belongs. Format is `siteName/namespace`, where `siteName` is the name of the site and `namespace` is a Wix application such as Stores or Bookings. The generic namespace 'Corvid' represents site code not associated with a specific Wix application.

members.name: receiveTimestamp
members.doc: Time the log entry was received in UTC format.

members.name: severity
members.doc: Severity of the log entry. One of the standard severity levels defined here.

members.name: insertId
members.doc: Unique identifier for the log entry. Prevents duplicate log entries by removing...

members.name: labels
members.doc: An object containing additional information about the log entry.

members.name: operation
members.doc: An object containing information about the operation (???) associated with the log entry. Only applicable for log entries with `Corvid` namespace.

members.name: sourceLocation
members.doc: Source code location information associated with the log entry. Only applicable for log entries with `Corvid` namespace.

members.name: jsonPayload
members.doc: Payload of the log entry in JSON format.

docs.summary: An object containing information about the operation (???) associated with the log entry. Only applicable for log entries with `Corvid` namespace.

members.name: producer
members.doc: Source code context, such as a page URL or web module function.

docs.summary: Source code location information associated with the log entry. Only applicable for log entries with `Corvid` namespace.

members.name: line
members.doc: Line within the source file. 1-based. 0 indicates no line number available.
